content: Yes, pelicans are truly remarkable birds! Their ability to store enough food for multiple meals is just one of the amazing adaptations that help them thrive in their aquatic habitats. Another interesting adaptation is their method of hunting. Pelicans will fly over the water searching for schools of fish, and when they spot one, they will dive into the water from as high as 60 feet, using their bill to scoop up the fish as they resurface. It's a spectacular sight to see!
